Create Code to Graph Temperatures
=================================
author: you

### MET4930-06: Climate Change

Get the temperature data

```{r}
con = 'ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/mlost/operational/products/aravg.ann.land.00N.90N.v3.5.4.201407.asc'
df = read.table(con)
names(df) = c("Year", "Temp")
df[1:3, 1:2]
```

Install the plotting package

```{r}
chooseCRANmirror(ind = 1)
install.packages('ggplot2')
library(ggplot2)
```

Make a graph

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Year, y = Temp)) +
  geom_line() 
```

Make the graph better

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = Year, y = Temp)) +
  geom_line() + 
  ylab("Temperature Anomaly (C)") +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_smooth()
```
